BEMShapeFunc Struct Reference
[Shape functions]

Detailed Description

BEM shape function definition

Parameters:
s area coordinate
t second area coordinate
L array to be filled with the shape function(s) at (s,t)
dLds array to be filled with the derivatives of L at (s,t)
dLdt array to be filled with the derivatives of L at (s,t)
Returns:
0 on success
